title: FO-12: Foundation (Types, Agents, Seeds, Actions)
description:
## Scope

Delivers all backend/data-layer code for FO-12: types, constants, implementation provider module, Mastra agents (discovery + affirmation), KV store seeds (based on Trinev2 reference), and server actions.

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md` — Sections: "Technical Architecture", "KV Store Keys", "File Structure"

## Key Files

- `app/fo-12/types.ts` — FO12 types and constants (TARGET_LOVED=30, PHASE sizes)
- `src/fo-12/` — Implementation provider module (context, selector, index)
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-12/` — Discovery and affirmation agents
- `src/db/seeds/fo-12.ts` — KV store seeds based on Trinev2 reference
- `src/db/seeds/index.ts` — Register fo-12 seeds (existing file, modify)
- `app/fo-12/actions.ts` — Server actions for discovery steps 4-5 and affirmation batches

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order (they build on each other)
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-trinev2-reference.md` for prompt content
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done
- FO-12 uses a SINGLE `fo-12` namespace (same pattern as FO-11's `fo-11` namespace)
- Discovery steps are numbered 4 (context) and 5 (tone) — not FO-11's 5, 6, 7
- Affirmation batch size is 10 (not FO-11's 5), with dynamic sizing for phase 3
notes: 2026-02-16 14:35 - EPIC COMPLETE: All 4 tasks done. Types (TARGET_LOVED=30, PHASE1/2_SIZE=10), agents (discovery steps 4-5, affirmation batch 10), seeds (11 keys from Trinev2, batch_size variable in feedback prompt), actions (generateDiscoveryStep 4|5, generateAffirmationBatchFO12 with batchSize param). All pass tsc --noEmit and db:seed. Key pattern: prompt_affirmation_with_feedback uses {{ batch_size }} for dynamic phase 3 sizing.
closed_reason: All 4 tasks completed: types, agents, seeds, actions
